system.requirements:
Tier 2; None
Aptitudes: WS or BS, Finesse, Unaligned
system.effect: Character can wield two one-handed ranged weapons or two one-handed melee weapons at once. They can make a Two-Weapon Wielding Attack as a Half Action, Attacks are made at -20, however the character can make one Half-Action Duration attack action with each weapon (be it Single Attack, Swift Attack, Lightning Attack, Single Shot, Semi-Auto Burst, or Full Auto Burst), This can talent can be taken multiple times Two-Weapon Wielder (Ranged) (BS Aptitude), and Two-Weapon Wielder (Melee) (WS Aptitude), both are requried to wield a melee and ranged weapon combination. Other Talents, such as Ambidextrous, Blademaster, Gunslinger, Sidearm, etc, improve on this one.
